name: Hide Or Die
detailed_description:
Hide or Die is an asymmetrical (1 vs 15) survival horror game where all 16 players start together. When the underground bunker doors open survivors flood the area looking for items, supplies, and if they so choose; the darkness. If a player gets too close to the darkness it consumes them and turns them into a crazed killer. Other survivors will need to complete randomized objectives to fill the world with light to illuminate their escape zone.

If players reach the escape, they can safely store their items and supplies or store nothing and risk their loot for big rewards! When the lights die out and the darkness closes in they must continue through a procedurally generated world ensuring that no escape is the same as the last. A new darkness awaits to be found and one of the remaining will be consumed; you can not always trust your friends. Who is in control; the darkness or you?

short_description: Enter a world of tension and discomfort with 15 others in this asymmetrical survival horror. Resist the urge to creep into the darkness, it will turn you against the others.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Italian
*languages with full audio support

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
